dialogue.introduction: I'm Ashigara. My specialty is surface combat. Nice to meet you.
dialogue.library_intro: I am the Ashigara that participated in the English fleet review, you know. I was acknowledged as the 'Hungry Wolf'. But of course! With this fearless body! Eh? That's got nothing to do with my sex appeal? And wasn't even a praise? There's... no way that's right!
dialogue.secretary1: What is it? Did something happen?
dialogue.secretary2: What? Is it time for a sortie?
dialogue.secretary3: P-Please don't touch me. I can take care of my own equipment.
dialogue.secretaryidle: When do I deploy!? Tell me, when and where do I deploy to!? Combat, battle, VICTORY IS CALLING TO ME!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Are you alright? Don't overdo yourself, kay? Whether it's an encounter or a battle, the beginning is the most crucial after all! Let's always face them in the best condition!
dialogue.wedding: To truly pull out my full strength… You are… you're the first to do so!
dialogue.show_players_score: You have a message. I wonder what it is...
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: It's time for a sortie! Battle... VICTORY is calling for me!
dialogue.equipment1: I love it when I feel myself getting stronger!
dialogue.equipment2: Amazing! I can feel the power! Hey, I can fire a test shot right?!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Are you anxious about my combat?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Well, it takes good rest too for the sake of victory. Alright, I'll take a break!
dialogue.docking_complete: Just saying that a ship has finished repairing.
dialogue.ship_construction: We've got a new companion. Let's go meet her.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: It looks like a fleet has returned from an operation.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Ashigara, reporting for duty! Look forward to a victory report!
dialogue.battle_start: Top speed! Prepare the cannons! Fire!
dialogue.night_battle: Time for round two. All ships, charge!
dialogue.night_attack: My ten cannons aren't just for show!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: My ten cannons aren't just for show!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: My ten cannons aren't just for show!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: My ten cannons aren't just for show!
dialogue.mvp: Ah, it's natural consequence with me, Ashigara! A great victory!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Shit! I can't believe I've taken this much damage...
dialogue.sunk: Damn, the victory was my only pride...
dialogue.white_day_2015: Ehh? What are these hands for? The return gift for the chocolate has yet.... Aahh.... Eh? Is that so?
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Isn't it our two years anniversary!? This is amazing! I'm filled with passion! I'll fry the number of katsu!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: This year's summer is approaching, isn't it? I'm somewhat pumped up. This year is a goer!
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn is a bit lonesome, right? Alright, in times like these we need the victory cutlet curry! Alright, I'll make some!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas! Tonight's main dish is Katsu, obviously. Victory in the holy night. That's right!
dialogue.new_year_2016: A Happy New Year, Admiral. This year too, I'll aim for victory with a blast. Yes, of course. I'll do it!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Mame-maki, eh? Sounds good to me. Here's hoping I don't hit Myoukou-neesan when throwing them. Ahh...!

hourly.0000: Midnight, the date has changed. And now, the true start of the Naval Base begins!
hourly.0100: 0100. In the depths of night, the senses are sharper. It's the best...
hourly.0200: 0200. Alright! Image Training for Victory! Good ni~ght!
hourly.0300: 0300. Zzz.... Ha! It's dangerous, Admiral! I'll... Zzz...
hourly.0400: 0400..brgl... I can take on all you guys by myself... you're all bark and no bite...zzz
hourly.0500: 0500. mrgl...Is there...nobody with more backbone... This Ashigara-sama will...zzz
hourly.0600: 0600. Wa-Wha!? The Admiral's gone!? Admiral, where are you?? Maybe in the next room?
hourly.0700: 0700. Whoa, you surprised me. Admiral! Why are you with Myouko!?
hourly.0800: 0800. I'm surprisingly hungry. Mamiya-san, a Victory set plea~se!
hourly.0900: 0900. Admiral, of course the breakfast set has to be Mamiya's, right! S~o De~lish!
hourly.1000: 1000. About time to sortie for Victory! Let's go, Heavy Cruiser Team!
hourly.1100: 1100. Heavy Cruisers are certainly awesome...this wolf-like motion. Right!?
hourly.1200: 1200. Admiral, lunch is a katsu sandwich. Of course, Victory! I'll shoulder the omen!
hourly.1300: 1300. In the afternoon too, let's all sally forth towards a win! Let's Go Victory!
hourly.1400: 1400! Training is just not enough, huh...I've got to get even stronger, like Myouko-neesan!
hourly.1500: 1500. Myouko-neesan is so strong. She doesn’t look like it at first glance, but on the contrary, she's scary...
hourly.1600: 1 600. Moreover... One time, when she got fired up, her lecture just went on and on! Eh? You knew?
hourly.1700: 1700. It's about the time that everybody in the long expedition returns, yeah? I wonder what the result will be?
hourly.1800: 1800. Well then, the secretary ship, this Ashigara-sama, shall prepare some celebratory Victory Curry!
hourly.1900: 1900. Okay! Bring on the oil! I'll fry them one-by-one!
hourly.2000: 2000.More than one hundred katsu...how appealing... Alright! Bring it on!
hourly.2100: 2100. Eehhh! My katsu curry caused heartburn! H-how did this happen!?
hourly.2200: 2200. Admiral, I don't need comforting or anything.... How strange... Why is that bad?
hourly.2300: 2300. A~lright! Feeling-swap complete! I'll do my best in tonight's Battle Image Training too!
